original_text: And when those hired about the eleventh hour came, each of them received a denarius.
korean_text: 제십일시에 온 자들이 와서 한 데나리온씩을 받거늘

sentences.original_text: And when those hired about the eleventh hour came
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 열한 시쯤에 고용된 사람들이 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: each of them received a denarius
